name: Workout Tracker
description: My first React Native project. An iOS app that provides a simple way to keep track of your daily exercises. Built with React Native using Expo, typescript and sqlite for the database.

name: ScubaLog
description: One of my first Projects, and one that I'm passionate about. Scubalog is a way for divers to digitally log their dives. An update is in the works utilizing a more modern tech stack with NextJS, TailwindCSS and PostgreSQL.

name: This Page
description: The website you're on right now! Simple portfolio site built from scratch with React and TailwindCSS. Data is populated via JSON for ease of maintenance in the future.
